title: Getting Rid of Matthew
description: An Alternative Cover Edition of ISBN 9780141025292 can be found hereWhen Matthew, Helen's lover of the past four years, finally decides to leave his wife Sophie (and their two daughters) and move into Helen's flat, she should be over the moon. The only trouble is, she doesn't want him any more. Now she has to figure out how to get rid of him...
author: Jane Fallon
